amendment.description: An amendment numbered 9 printed in Part B of House Report 116-126 to prohibit the use of funds for the GSA to market or sell the National Bio and Agro-defense Facility at Plum Island, New York.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Courtney amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Courtney.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Courtney amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
